casebody.data:
TILLMAN
v.
COMMERCIAL CREDIT. No. 360A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 4, 2006. John Alan Jones, G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Tillman and Richardson. Christopher J. Willis, Richard H. Sinkfield, Atlanta, GA, for Commercial Credit, et al. Carlene McNulty, Mallam J. Maynard, F. Paul Bland, Jr., Washington, DC, for NC Justice Center, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of September 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Commercial Credit, et al.) shall have up to and including the 16th day of November 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of October 2006."
